title: Extraction of Features for Lip-reading Using Autoencoders
excerpt: Abstract We study the incorporation of facial depth data in the task of isolated word visual speech recognition. We propose novel features based on unsupervised training of a single layer autoencoder. The features are extracted from both video and depth channels  ...
